nodes.text: An Imperial garrison overlooking the city of Mos Eisley on the Outer Rim world of Tatooine was in operation by the Galactic Empire during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The garrison, situated on top of a mountain overlooking the city, was staffed by a number of Imperial officers, and consisted of a couple pens for dewbacks.

The Imperial garrison overlooking Mos Eisley was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
